item.text: This is what we proclaim to you: what was from the beginning, what we have heard, what we have seen with our eyes, what we have looked at and our hands have touched (concerning the word of lifeâ€”

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> was <st data-num="5319" class="">revealed</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we have <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="518" class="">announce</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="5319" class="">revealed</st> to <st data-num="1473">us</st>).<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3739" class="">What</st> we have <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> we <st data-num="518" class="">announce</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2842" class="">fellowship</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> (<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">indeed</st> <st data-num="2251" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2842" class="">fellowship</st> is <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547">Christ</st>).
Thus we are writing these things so that our joy may be complete.
Now this is the gospel message we have heard from him and announce to you: God is light, and in him there is no darkness at all.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> we <st data-num="3004">say</st> we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2842" class="">fellowship</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet <st data-num="4043">keep on walking</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st>, we are <st data-num="5574" class="">lying</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">practicing</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="4043" class="">walk</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> he <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>, we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2842" class="">fellowship</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="2511" class="">cleanses</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> we <st data-num="3004">say</st> we do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">bear</st> the guilt of <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>,<n id="1" /> we are <st data-num="4105" class="">deceiving</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">ourselves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.

But <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="3670" class="">confess</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>, he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="863" class="">forgiving</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2511" class="">cleansing</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="93" class="">unrighteousness</st>.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> we <st data-num="3004">say</st> we have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="264" class="">sinned</st>, we <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="5583" class="">liar</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.
